preferences.name: clientId
preferences.title: Client ID
preferences.description: The client_id value seen in your Bitwarden account settings.

preferences.name: clientSecret
preferences.title: Client Secret
preferences.description: The client_secret value seen in your Bitwarden account settings.

preferences.name: cliPath
preferences.title: Bitwarden CLI Path
preferences.description: If you wish to use your own CLI, type here the location of your local installation. The typical location of it is '/usr/local/bin/bw' on Intel and '/opt/homebrew/bin/bw' on M1/Apple Silicon macs.

preferences.name: serverUrl
preferences.title: Bitwarden Server URL
preferences.description: Optional: URL to use for self-hosted servers.

preferences.name: serverCertsPath
preferences.title: Self-signed Certificates Path
preferences.description: Advanced: Path to self-signed TLS certificate for self-hosted instances.

preferences.name: syncOnLaunch
preferences.title: Customization
preferences.label: Sync Vault on Launch
preferences.description: Sync the vault on command launch. If unchecked, the vault will only be synced when the Sync Vault action is used.

preferences.name: fetchFavicons
preferences.label: Fetch Vault Icons
preferences.description: Use the Bitwarden icon server (icons.bitwarden.net) to fetch icons for vault items. If unchecked, built-in icons will be used.

preferences.name: repromptIgnoreDuration
preferences.title: Vault Timeout
preferences.description: The amount of time before the password must be re-entered to access the vault again.

preferences.name: windowActionOnCopy
preferences.title: Window Behaviour On Copy
preferences.description: What to do with the window when copying a value to the clipboard.

preferences.name: shouldCacheVaultItems
preferences.title: Performance
preferences.label: Enable Caching
preferences.description: Whether to cache vault items for faster load times. This will NOT cache the actual passwords and other sensitive values, only usernames/emails and other non-sensitive labels.
